import React, { Fragment } from 'react' import s from '../css/connexion.module.css' export default function Connexion() { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({}); const handleChange = (e) => { const name = e.target.name; const value = e.target.value; setInputs(values => ({ ...values, [name]: value })) } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); console.log(` email : ${inputs.email} ; mot de passe : ${inputs.mot_de_passe} ; `) } return (
